definition[0]: if the wind blows something over, or if something blows over, the wind makes it fall
example[0]: Our fence blew over in the storm.
example[1]: The hurricane blew many trees over.
definition[1]: if an argument or unpleasant situation blows over, it ends or is forgotten
example[2]: They weren’t speaking to each other, but I think it’s blown over now.
definition[2]: if a storm blows over, it goes away
